comments.body: Does removing the time value cause these tests to take longer (it looks like it will be a second now)?
It shouldn't, that's the panic reset timeout.  So no panics should happen unless we're catching one and it's hidden today.
Sure, that was my original goal with this is to start breaking the coupling.

diffHunk:

	fakeClient := tools.MakeFakeEtcdClient(t)
